channel.title: Ye Kaisen's blog
channel.description: 这是我的全新 Hugo 网站

item.title: First_post
item.author: Kaisen Ye
item.description: Today, I have a fever, TAT. Despite this setback, I am delighted to announce that I have successfully created my personal blog using Hugo and the LoveIt theme (LoveIt). I have been resting in bed for most of the day, trying to recover. Although I am currently unwell, I am determined to return to Hangzhou on February 18th. However, I have not yet completed my tasks for the lesson on the situation and policy.
